normalised: Arre yaar, cart abandonment? It's like seeing a beautiful saree at Nalli's on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty four, adding it, dreaming of rocking it at my cousin Priya's wedding, then...poof! Gone! Rupee two thousand five hundred lost to the digital gods. Happens all the time at five P.M. Did my wifi go phut again? Maybe it's sign from Mata Vaishno Devi, wait till fifteenth August two thousand and twenty four for the sales!
